wikipedia_page.main: Beth Mburu-Bowie  known by her stage name HowAboutBeth is an English artist, songwriter and trustee.

response: On 12 November, it was announced that Anna McDonald had left The Pipettes to pursue songwriting opportunities away from the band. On 11 February 2009, Beth Mburu-Bowie was announced as McDonald's replacement. This line-up made its live début on 5 March 2009 at the launch party of the British Music Experience. Beth toured and recorded the second album until late 2009 when she and The Pipettes parted ways. Her vocals were replaced on all recorded material. Earth vs. The Pipettes was produced by Martin Rushent and recorded at The Dutch House Studios at his home in Berkshire.
*Beth Mburu-Bowie – Backing Vocals on ‘The Chant’ and ‘Pot Is On Fire’
